messages.content: Suppose you are a user of a dialog system or conversational agent. List 15 diverse meal types for restaurant queries to the dialog system. Some examples are [pizza, lunch, salads, snacks, late-night, burgers, fast food, dinner, breakfast, fine dining, buffet, café].
